remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用靜態和方法，將轉換至。The following code example demonstrates how to use static and methods to convert a to a . 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 若要執行此範例中，將它貼到表單，其中包含兩個物件命名`Label1`和`Label2`，然後從表單的建構函式中呼叫這個方法。To run this example, paste it into a form that contains two objects named `Label1` and `Label2`, and then call this method from the form's constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes/VB/form1.vb#5)]

.property instance int32 Width
Public Property Width As Integer
public: property int Width { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個 結構的水平元件。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal component of this structure.

value.span: 這個 結構的水平元件 (通常是以像素為單位)。

span.span: The horizontal component of this structure, typically measured in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 單位和的結構相依於和設定用來繪製的物件。The unit for the and of the structure depend on the and settings for the object used to draw.
